languages.text: {n}Владайм мрачно усмехается.{/n} "Сдаться? Приползти на брюхе и умолять о снисхождении? Если бы вы знали, сколько трупов я уложил на палубы этой станции, чтобы добиться своего авторитета, вы бы поняли — для меня лучше сдохнуть в пустотном шлюзе, чем смотреть, как эта бесноватая сука губит мою станцию".

{n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм мрачно усмехается.{/n} "Сдаться? Приползти на брюхе и умолять о снисхождении? Если бы вы знали, сколько трупов я уложил на палубы этой станции, чтобы добиться своего авторитета, вы бы поняли — для меня лучше сдохнуть в пустотном шлюзе, чем смотреть, как эта бесноватая сука губит мою станцию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "I should've surrendered? I should've come crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I littered this station's decks with to gain the authority I have, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "I should've surrendered? I should've come crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I littered this station's decks with to gain the authority I have, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“投降？莫非我应该跪在她面前，乞求宽大处理吗？如果您知道，我在这座星站的甲板上处理掉了多少具尸体，才走到今天这个位置，那您应该很清楚，我宁可死在这个地方，也不想看那个被恶魔附体的臭婊子亲手毁了我的星站。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆阴沉地笑了起来。{/n}“我真的应该投降吗？我应该跪在她面前，乞求宽大处理吗？如果您知道，我在这座星站的甲板上处理掉了多少具尸体，才走到现在这个位置，那您应该很清楚，我宁可死在这个地方，也不想看那个被恶鬼附体的臭婊子亲手毁了我的星站。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは暗い顔で笑った。{/n}「降参だと？腹這いになって、寛大な処置を乞うべきだったか？私がここまでのし上がるために、どれだけの遺体をこのステーションのデッキにまき散らかしてきたか、知っているか？あの呪われた女がステーションを破壊するのを見るくらいなら、虚空の部屋で死んだ方がマシだ。」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは暗い顔で笑った。{/n}「降参するべきだったか？腹這いになって、寛大な処置を乞うべきだったか？私がこのステーションのデッキにどれだけの遺体をまき散らかしてきたか、知っているか？あの呪われた女がステーションを破壊するのを見るくらいなら、虚空の部屋で死んだ方がマシだ。」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sonríe sombríamente.{/n} «¿Rendirme? ¿Arrastrarme y suplicar clemencia? Si tuviera idea de con cuántos cadáveres ensucié las cubiertas de esta estación para hacerme con el poder, sabría que prefiero morir en una cámara de vacío que ver a esa zorra poseída destruir mi estación».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sonríe sombríamente.{/n} «¿Debería haberme rendido? ¿Debería haber venido arrastrándome, suplicando clemencia? Si tuviera idea de con cuántos cadáveres ensucié las cubiertas de esta estación para conseguir la autoridad que tengo, sabría que prefiero morir en una cámara de vacío que ver a esa zorra poseída destruir mi estación».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym kichert finster.{/n} "Mich ergeben? Auf dem Bauch angerobbt kommen und um Gnade flehen? Hättet Ihr einen blassen Schimmer, mit wie vielen Leichen ich die Decks dieser Station übersät habe, um an die Macht zu kommen, dann wüsstet Ihr: Ich würde lieber in einer Leerekammer sterben als zuzusehen, wie diese besessene Schlampe meine Station zerstört."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym kichert finster.{/n} "Hätte ich mich ergeben sollen? Hätte ich auf dem Bauch angerobbt kommen sollen und um Gnade flehen? Hättet Ihr einen blassen Schimmer, mit wie vielen Leichen ich die Decks dieser Station übersät habe, um meine Autorität zu verdienen, dann wüsstet Ihr: Ich würde lieber in einer Leerekammer sterben als zuzusehen, wie diese besessene Schlampe meine Station zerstört."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym pousse un petit rire sombre.{/n} « Me rendre ? Que je rampe devant elle pour implorer sa clémence ? Si vous saviez combien de cadavres j'ai laissés derrière moi sur cette station pour obtenir l'autorité dont je jouis aujourd'hui, vous sauriez que je préférerais mourir dans un sas de décompression plutôt que de voir cette folle furieuse détruire ma station. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym pousse un petit rire sombre.{/n} « Me soumettre ? Vous auriez voulu que je rampe devant elle pour implorer sa clémence ? Si vous saviez combien de cadavres j'ai laissés derrière moi pour obtenir l'autorité dont je jouis aujourd'hui, vous sauriez que je préférerais mourir dans un sas de décompression plutôt que de voir cette folle furieuse détruire ma station. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, tehditkâr bir tonla gülüyor.{/n} "Teslim mi olacaktım? Yerlerde sürünüp af mı dilenecektim? Bu makamı elde etmek için istasyonu kaç cesetle doldurduğumu bir görseydiniz keşke. O çılgın kahpenin istasyonumu yok edişini izlemektense uçsuz odasında gebermeyi yeğleyeceğimi ancak bu vesileyle anlardınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym chuckles darkly.{/n} "Surrender? Go crawling on my belly, begging for leniency? If you had any idea how many corpses I've littered across this station's decks on my rise to power, you'd know I would rather die in a void chamber than watch that possessed bitch destroy my station."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym tehditkâr bir tonla gülüyor.{/n} "Teslim mi olacaktım? Yerlerde sürünüp af mı dilenecektim? Bu makamı elde etmek için istasyonu kaç cesetle doldurduğumu bir görseydiniz keşke. O çılgın kahpenin istasyonumu yok edişini izlemektense uçsuz odasında gebermeyi yeğleyeceğimi ancak bu vesileyle anlardınız."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
